Summary Note:
The RM first met Anaís Araceli Soto at a wine tasting event in Madrid. They discovered a shared passion for fine wines and decided to explore potential business ventures together.
Anaís Araceli Soto is a 37 year old and comes from Spain.
Seeking a trusted partner for wealth management, she joined Julius Baer for its comprehensive and tailored services.
Family Background: Anaís Araceli Soto is currently divorced. She has 1 kid called Valeria.
Education Background:
Anaís earned her secondary school diploma from IES Félix Rodríguez de la Fuente Oviedo in 2006.
Anaís attended Reina Sofia Museum School and graduated in 2010.
Occupation History:
With a career spanning nearly 13 years, Anaís Araceli Soto has established herself as a key player in the industry.
Anaís Araceli Soto launched her career as a Journalist at Atresmedia Corporación de Medios de Comunicación S.A., where she gained valuable experience from 2012 to 2013.
In 2013, she moved to Telefónica S.A. to work as a Editor, applying her knowledge to achieve outstanding performance.
Her tenure as a Publisher at Telefónica S.A. from 2016 till now was marked by significant achievements and a deepening understanding of the field.
Wealth Summary:
Throughout her career, she saved 120000 EUR, investing in various assets to grow her wealth.
She has townhouse located in Teruel, worth 1250000 EUR.

She purchased townhouse in Segovia, where she spends her holidays. It is valued at 1180000 EUR.
On top of that she inherited a beautiful townhouse in Córdoba, which could be used as a weekend getaway. It is valued at 1020000 EUR.

In addition to her career success, she also received an inheritance of 2510000 EUR from her late grandmother, a renowned Stock Trader, in 2017.
Client Summary: In summary, Anaís has demonstrated a strong work ethic and financial acumen, positioning them well for the future.
